oracle.kubernetes.operator.wlsconfig

Class WlsDomainConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.kubernetes.operator.wlsconfig.WlsDomainConfig

  • public class WlsDomainConfig
extends Object
    Contains a snapshot of configuration for a WebLogic Domain

    • Constructor Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • WlsDomainConfig

        public WlsDomainConfig(String name)
        Constructor when no JSON response is available
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the WLS domain

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static WlsDomainConfig create(String jsonResult)
        Create a new WlsDomainConfig object using the json result from the WLS REST call
        Parameters:
        jsonResult - A String containing the JSON response from the WLS REST call
        Returns:
        A new WlsDomainConfig object created with information from the JSON response

      • getName

        public String getName()
        Return the name of the WLS domain
        Returns:
        Name of the WLS domain

      • getClusterConfigs

        public Map<String,WlsClusterConfig> getClusterConfigs()
        Returns all cluster configurations found in the WLS domain
        Returns:
        A Map of WlsClusterConfig, keyed by name, containing server configurations for all clusters found in the WLS domain

      • getServerConfigs

        public Map<String,WlsServerConfig> getServerConfigs()
        Returns configuration of servers found in the WLS domain, including admin server, standalone managed servers that do not belong to any cluster, and statically configured managed servers that belong to a cluster. It does not include dynamic servers configured in dynamic clusters.
        Returns:
        A Map of WlsServerConfig, keyed by name, for each server configured the WLS domain

      • getMachineConfigs

        public Map<String,WlsMachineConfig> getMachineConfigs()
        Returns configuration of machines found in the WLS domain.
        Returns:
        A Map of WlsMachineConfig, keyed by name, for each machine configured the WLS domain

      • getClusterConfig

        public WlsClusterConfig getClusterConfig(String clusterName)
        Returns the configuration for the WLS cluster with the given name
        Parameters:
        clusterName - name of the WLS cluster
        Returns:
        The WlsClusterConfig object containing configuration of the WLS cluster with the given name. This methods return an empty WlsClusterConfig object even if no WLS configuration is found for the given cluster name.

      • getServerConfig

        public WlsServerConfig getServerConfig(String serverName)
        Returns the configuration for the WLS server with the given name. Note that this method would not return dynamic server.
        Parameters:
        serverName - name of the WLS server
        Returns:
        The WlsServerConfig object containing configuration of the WLS server with the given name. This methods return null if no WLS configuration is found for the given server name.

      • getMachineConfig

        public WlsMachineConfig getMachineConfig(String machineName)
        Returns the configuration for the WLS machine with the given name.
        Parameters:
        machineName - name of the WLS machine
        Returns:
        The WlsMachineConfig object containing configuration of the WLS machine with the given name. This methods return null if no WLS machine is configured with the given name.

      • getRetrieveServersSearchUrl

        public static String getRetrieveServersSearchUrl()

      • getRetrieveServersSearchPayload

        public static String getRetrieveServersSearchPayload()

      • validate

        public boolean validate(DomainSpec domainSpec)

      • validate

        public boolean validate(DomainSpec domainSpec,
                        List<ConfigUpdate> suggestedConfigUpdates)
        Checks the provided k8s domain spec to see if it is consistent with the configuration of the WLS domain. The method also logs warning if inconsistent WLS configurations are found.
        Parameters:
        domainSpec - The DomainSpec to be validated against the WLS configuration
        suggestedConfigUpdates - a List of ConfigUpdate objects containing suggested WebLogic config updates that are necessary to make the WebLogic domain consistent with the DomainSpec. Optional.
        Returns:
        true if the DomainSpec has been updated, false otherwise

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
